src/js/components/PulseDashboard/constan.description: PulseDashboard constants module created with 14 exported constant objects for metric thresholds (VELOCITY, COMMUNITY, ISSUES, PR_HEALTH, BUS_FACTOR, FRESHNESS), status labels (STATUS_THRESHOLDS, STATUS_LABELS, TREND_THRESHOLDS), pulse configuration (PULSE), defaults (DEFAULT_METRIC, DEFAULTS), and time helpers (TIME_MS, TIME_DAYS). Follows HealthScore.js pattern.

src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCa.description: PulseCalculator module created with 10 utility functions for pulse metrics calculations: average(), daysSince(), daysBetween(), getTrendDirection(), getMetricStatus(), getDefaultMetric(), clamp(), percentageChange(), safeParseDate(), emptySparkline(). Uses constants from constants.js (STATUS_THRESHOLDS, TREND_THRESHOLDS, DEFAULTS, DEFAULT_METRIC, TIME_MS). All functions handle edge cases (null, undefined, invalid inputs) gracefully.
